text: Cameron Robert Burgess (born 21 October 1995) is a Scottish-born Australian soccer player. He plays for Ipswich Town in the EFL Championship and for the Australia men's national soccer team. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League
